reviewText: package was open, and I had to purchase a regional 0 thru 9 dvd playing to play it, but I love the citcom

Wonderful set, includes all six seasons plus Christmas episodes. One Foot in the Grave has to be the funniest sitcom ever written and produced, with very talented actors. This is a region 2 dvd set, so if you're in the U.S. you will need an all-region player to watch it (Amazon sells them, and in my opinion, if you like British TV, the players are well worth buying).
